text: @TheGautrain I would like to know whether all those cars that are parked outside the Midrand Gautrain station are safe? #BridgeCollapse
@RediTlhabi I think you should call to order the callers who racialise the #BridgeCollapse. Incompetence is incompetence. It has no race!
@RediTlhabi This is my theory about the #BridgeCollapse pic.twitter.com/0xRXcUq4of
White South Africa lost interest in the #BridgeCollapse the moment they realised it didn't uphold the "BEE Tenders Are Corrupt" narrative
#BridgeCollapse Lots of reaction pouring in this morning: Jacob Zuma, Transport Minister, NUM, ANC, DA. All of it on #EWN.
